Stage 1

12 Oct 2015

Blog MVC Application for RAD301 (2015-16)

MVC App to work with Blogs & Posts. A number of branches (Stagex) add progressively to the objectives of the app. Checkout each branch to see the new features.

Stage 1 (w/s 12-10-15)

The Index action method of the Home Controller displays the list of Blogs. Clicking on each Blog displays details about that Blog (e.g. Title and Author).

Concepts examined: * Role of Controller as 'director of operations' - routing. * Preparation of Views either directly or through scaffolding * Initial minor role of Models folder for Blog and Post * Introduction of ViewModels folder to represent custom views of data in Models * Preparation of data (artificially) in Controller for publishing through Views.
